message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your offer was a good start, Alice. How about we meet a bit closer to the middle?
Let's try to meet in the middle, 58-42 is my new offer.
Time is running out, Alice! This is a very generous offer considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats your share further!
